content.rendered:
We have won the Deloitte Technology Fast 50 award for the fastest-growing young company in Central Europe and we are looking for new colleagues who will help us move our project forward! Take the opportunity to take part in the rapidly growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague in our Affiliate department. The ideal candidate has proven experience with affiliate programs, experience with financial markets and perfect command of the English language.

What will be your scope of work?

  • Maintain and develop the agenda of our Affiliate Programme
  • Active communication with partners and solving their potential problems
  • Acquisition of new partners to expand the programme
  • Optimization of the programme conditions to make it as effective as possible
  • Management of existing partners’ activities and monitoring of their performance
  • Preparation of reports and campaign results
  • Performance monitoring of campaigns and their optimization to achieve the best possible sales results and commission generation
  • Providing coaching and support to colleagues to improve their affiliate marketing skills
  • Following new trends in affiliate marketing to stay up-to-date

What do we expect from you?

  • Perfect communication in the English language (written and spoken)
  • Ability to monitor and analyse affiliate programme performance data, identify trends and make optimizations to improve results
  • Strong communication skills to effectively deal with affiliate partners, provide support and resolve queries
  • Ability to search for and recruit new partners, but also the ability to build and maintain long-term relationships with key partners
  • Actively monitor and operate in the affiliate marketplace and online environment to find potential partners
  • Ability to come up with new, innovative and creative ways to increase affiliate programme performance and utilise new trends and approaches in affiliate marketing
  • Have a dynamic and flexible approach to different partners or types of campaigns so that a win-win situation is always achieved

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 130+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals
  • We encourage self-realisation, and we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on himself/herself and move professionally forward
  • Thanks to our progressive pace and mindset, you can be assured that you won’t get bored with us
  • We will train you on financial markets and all other related topics so you know our business
  • You will work from modern offices in the city centre of Prague
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club or other activities
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us

Did we get your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile, together with a short motivational letter and we’ll gladly consider your application and then will be happy to invite you for an interview.
